heading: Age and Location Restrictions
content: Users must be at least 18 years old and reside in locations where online gambling is legal.
Users are responsible for ensuring they comply with local gambling laws.

heading: Risks Involved
content: There are inherent risks in online betting, including potential monetary losses.
Betting outcomes are uncertain, and users should bet responsibly.

heading: Wallet Security
content: Wakanda operates with non-custodial wallets.
Users are solely responsible for their wallet's security and any resulting fund losses.

heading: No Liability for User Funds
content: Wakanda is not responsible for user funds, as it does not manage or hold them at any time.

heading: Amendments to Terms
content: Wakanda can modify these terms at any time, and continued use post-modification implies acceptance of the new terms.

heading: Acknowledgement of Terms
content: By using Wakanda, users confirm understanding and agreement to these terms.

heading: Termination of Services
content: Wakanda can terminate services for users violating these terms or for other necessary reasons.

heading: Contact Information
content: Users can reach Wakanda for inquiries or support through the official Wakanda Discord or Twitter channel.

heading: Responsible Gaming
content: Wakanda encourages responsible gaming.
Users should not bet more than they can afford to lose.

heading: Prohibited Activities
content: Users must not engage in fraudulent activities, manipulation of services, or any illegal activities using Wakanda.

heading: Intellectual Property
content: All content on Wakanda, including text, graphics, and interfaces, is the property of Wakanda and is protected by intellectual property laws.

heading: Privacy Policy
content: User's personal information is handled as per the privacy policy detailed on the Wakanda website.

heading: Limitation of Liability
content: Wakanda is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of its services.

heading: Governing Law
content: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which Wakanda operates.

heading: Third-Party Services
content: Wakanda may contain links to third-party websites or services, which are not controlled by Wakanda.
Users access these at their own risk.

heading: Complaints and Redress
content: Users can file complaints regarding Wakanda services through the official Wakanda Twitter or Discord community channel.
The specific procedure for lodging complaints is outlined there.
